document.full_text: lindsey vonn, who entered friday's slalom with a 27-point edge, now trails maria riesch by 3 in the world cup women's overall standings heading into saturday's giant slalom.
document.title: riesch leapfrogs vonn and sets up a showdown
lines_and_colors: lindsey vonn, who entered friday's slalom with a 27-point edge, now trails maria riesch by 3 in the world cup women's overall standings heading into saturday's giant slalom.
